text: The 1902–03 international cricket season was from September 1902 to April 1903. ==Season overview== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="7" |International tours |- ! rowspan="2" |Start date ! rowspan="2" |Home team ! rowspan="2" |Away team ! colspan="4" |Results [Matches] |- !Test !ODI !FC !LA |- | | | |0–2 [3] |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |- | | | |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |0–2 [2] |; style="text-align:center"| — |- | | | |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |2–0 [3] |; style="text-align:center"| — |} ==October== ===Australia in South Africa=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! colspan="9"|Test series |- ! title: International cricket in 1902–03
